3. 10 OPERACIONNES EN LA CALCULADORA WINDOWS:

a) 234+ 32-21*45/65 = 169.62
b) 456-65+78/87*89 = 479.78
c) 123*456/67-78+76 = 835.13
d) 546/56*98-45+347 = 1257.5
e) 567-98+2234/456*876 = 5192.61
f) 66*35*27/180 = 346.5
g) 93*4/2+25-64 = 147
h) 906/2*6-1632 = 1086
i) 66-5-7-29-34+99 = 90
j) 65/5*22-459+100 = -73
